name: Are the requirements written in 4 year old english, and when you read it can you understand it?
description: Evaluates if the requirements are simple and understandable.

name: Are the requirements being signed off by the business?
description: Checks if business stakeholders approve the requirements.

name: Is the tech lead formally reviewing and signing off on the requirements?
description: Ensures technical review and approval by the tech lead.

name: Are open questions formally documented?
description: Checks if open questions are clearly tracked and documented.

name: Do the requirements document out-of-scope as well as in-scope items?
description: Ensures both in-scope and out-of-scope items are documented.

name: Document assumptions & dependencies
description: Checks if assumptions and dependencies are explicitly documented.

name: Are you tracking changes to the requirements?
description: Evaluates if changes to requirements are being tracked.
